website_summaries.verdict: This feminine-looking linen handbag is available in six color patterns.
pros: Handmade, so the design is individual to each one
Comes in six lovely color patterns
The styling and colors are easy to match and suitable for any clothing ensemble
Added security of an interior side pocket
cons: A few complained of hardware breaking or size and color not what they expected

customer_reviews.title: Vintage Handbag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really cute. It's a good size, not large, but a evening bag size so you can actually take some things with you. It looks just as pictured. It has an inside chain so you can wear it cross-body if you want to. I like this bag a lot. The metal handle is very unique and if you want to just "clutch" it, just let the handle drop and grab it. If you like the bag as pictured, you won't be disappointed to have it in person. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: coyote

customer_reviews.title: Great purse!
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely vintage! Nice quality, this with a sleek liner and small inside pocket. Nice handle and nice chain. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for phone lip stick, just right size
customer_reviews.text: Love this purse, got a lot of compliments on it. I put my phone, lip stick and tic tacs. has a nice pocket inside to put your license in. I got so many compliments , you can mix and match, with these great colors on the purse. Wore with a Black dress, , Cream and Black jacket, and Green jewelry the same green on purse. with antique finish too.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Dial

customer_reviews.title: Cute little evening purse
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little bag. It seems to be well made and sturdy. I got several compliments when I used it and had to keep my mom from "borrowing" it from me. Received 4 stars because it would be nice to be able to remove the little clutch handle when you use the long purse strap, but you can't, and I thought it was a little bigger than it really is.
customer_reviews.author: Angela B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this little purse
customer_reviews.text: Love this little purse. I like that it can stand on its own. It is big enough to fit my samsung S7 cell phone, plus change purse, credit card holder, chap stick and other small items. And it is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Charboneau

customer_reviews.title: This purse is great quality. I was very impressed by the construction ...
customer_reviews.text: This purse is great quality. I was very impressed by the construction of this item. The inside lining is thick but satiny, the beading was well done and the clasp for the shoulder chain folss in and out without causing any issue when closing it.
customer_reviews.author: katie sloan

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and seems well made.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift. I often get these types of bags to hold gift cards or printouts of gifts. This is big enough to hold a case for glasses and a small credit card holder, lipstick and some cash. Perfect for dressy or jeans.
customer_reviews.author: CJonline

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's cute! Some of the stitching was undone, but it didn't bother me, I only needed it for one night. It's a pretty little purse.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Conley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag! It's very elegant and will even go with leggings and a nice sweater. I'm not disappointed in this purchase at all!
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my small purse.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with my purchase. The small purse arrived promptly and was well packed. The purse is prettier than pictured and looks more expensive than it was.. I ordered the black version and it has vivid green leaves that accent it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Surpassed all thoughts!! This is sooo wonderful! Sturdy and feminine... Love this. Going to use as often as possible!
customer_reviews.author: BBMTN

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little bag. I used it for an outdoor/garden wedding where I wore a black hi-lo linen dress and a fuschia silk/linen jacket. The bag was perfect with the black strappy heels and attire I described. I think the beading around the floral applique make this bag special.
customer_reviews.author: patricia43

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vintage Evening Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this small evening bag, and as I only wear long dresses it goes with so many different styles, and I get many compliments when I use it. It can look equally good for casual or formal wear.
customer_reviews.author: Bluren

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but small
customer_reviews.text: Handle on bag was broken right out of the package. I was able to repair it myself but Really?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handbag impressive for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving the bag to a friend for her birthday in November. I was very impressed with the quality of the bag. I think she will love it. She loves unusual evening bags and this fits the bill. The background is not accurately displayed in the photograph, but I like it just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana Girl

customer_reviews.title: iphone doesn't fit inside
customer_reviews.text: I really love this handbag. It is a design that could compliment many different outfit colors. I have to return it, however, because I cannot fit my iphone inside of it and that makes it unusable for me. Otherwise, the quality of the purse suits the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Elam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good size for a night out and will fit a lot of things. I'm happy with it:)
customer_reviews.author: htmomof2

customer_reviews.title: There is beautiful beading outlining the design that doesn't show up that ...
customer_reviews.text: Even cuter than In person! There is beautiful beading outlining the design that doesn't show up that well in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag is pretty small, so check the dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Bag is pretty small, so check the dimensions. It’s very cute and a great alternative to the matronly styles out there.
customer_reviews.author: Ophelia

customer_reviews.title: Too Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love the style of the purse. The beading is tight, won't come off for a long time. However, there is a shoulder chain that broke the first time I used it. Just snapped right off. No, it won't be difficult to fix, but the quality is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Eve

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag. Looks vintage
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag. Looks vintage. Able to hold I phone keys wallet. Nice clasp to close or pretty chain for over shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Drenik

customer_reviews.title: ... birthday present for my friend and she fell in love with it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this handbag as a birthday present for my friend and she fell in love with it. The pictures don't do it justice. Beautifully decorated and made well with the added surprise of a chain shoulder strap. Made my friend's day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prettier than the picture
customer_reviews.text: This is even prettier than the picture. I have no need for it. I should send it back. I'm keeping it. Sometimes beauty is enough of an excuse.
customer_reviews.author: R. T. Watson

customer_reviews.title: This bag is beautifully made. I can pair it with my dresses ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is beautifully made. I can pair it with my dresses or casual jeans. I get so many compliments on it. Fits my phone, small wallet, and a few pieces of makeup
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Handle was broken
customer_reviews.text: The bag was beautiful but the handle was not attached to the bag. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: msholl6002

customer_reviews.title: The makers put the disclaimer in the description saying the purse may not look like the one pictured
customer_reviews.text: Beware. The makers put the disclaimer in the description saying the purse may not look like the one pictured, but I thought I'd take a chance. Well they need to just go ahead and say, "The purse we send you WON'T look like the picture." Like other buyers, I want the big flower on the purse - not just a sliver of the flower. Just move the pattern over and "fussy cut" it, please. The one pictured is WAY CUTER. Why not put a variety of pictures so we can see what we might get? It's not bad - just not as good as the picture. So I say, "Booooo." : (
customer_reviews.author: DesignGal

customer_reviews.title: The beading was very detailed and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This handbag is simlpy gorgeous! The beading was very detailed and super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty bag. I plan on using on date nights. Good size. Perfect for phone, wallet a lipstick. Probably even more.
customer_reviews.author: mrschexx

customer_reviews.title: Vintage beaded handbag.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my vintage purse! Beautiful, just the right size for an evening bag. I bought the gray flowers, with pretty green leaves. And beading. Will go with many colors. Can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Purse
customer_reviews.text: Great purse! I bought it to go with my vintage dress , for my son's wedding. I received nothing but complements on it. Good quality ,beautiful beading and handle was also a lovely accent.
customer_reviews.author: Gloryanne

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this item to match a dress in the play "Harvey" and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Really a cute purse. We purchased this item to match a dress in the play "Harvey" and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wroblewski

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love e erything about this purse... From the intricate handle to the beautiful flower appliqué!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value! Stylish and not too small
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, it is as described and will compliment my outfit. It is definitely a special occasion purse not an every day bag However I think it will hold my phone and wallet nicely.
customer_reviews.author: W.M. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Vintage Purse for 1920s day party!!
customer_reviews.text: My purse arrived on time and in perfect condition. I am very satisfied with this purchase, the purse even had a hidden inner chain strap so that I can attach it and be hands free.
customer_reviews.author: leslie marks

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Love it! Used it for a wedding but Also dressed up a pair of jeans with a boho beige top, and flats for a nite out.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hanken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's a perfect small purse for attending weddings, banquets etc. Adorable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. I don't like to carry a big purse when I'm out for the evening and this is just the right size. Also love the vintage look. I was so pleasef I bought several others in different colors for myself and to give as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty though.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very tiny bag. It looks bigger in the picture. It is pretty though.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Charming and versatile
customer_reviews.text: So cute!! The photos of this bag are on target. It is beautiful and met my needs. Best of all, the kiss lock stayed closed which is always a concern with this type of bag. I'm thinking about ordering another color!
customer_reviews.author: ByrdS

customer_reviews.title: Quite disappointed. It's not that bright as shown in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed. It's not that bright as shown in the picture. The handle and strap is dull and not golden as shown. And my iPhone 6s doesn't fits into this bag at all. Otherwise the beaded work is very nice so iam going to keep this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far...
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made purse it seems. It's very cute as you can see and the beads seem to be attached securely. With reasonable or easy use it would last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: RoseEve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little handbag. Large enough to carry my ID, phone, and lipstick but still small and looks classy.
customer_reviews.author: Joy L. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful little handbag and it looks much, much more expensive than it is! I purchased it for a black tie event and received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: A writer and a reader

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The most absolutely beautiful thing I have ever seen! Simply gorgeous! !!!
customer_reviews.author: Levette

customer_reviews.title: It was very nice
customer_reviews.text: It just wasn’t the right color. I thought it was grey and black
customer_reviews.author: JANE P.

customer_reviews.title: Unique, but not gaudy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this bag!.... It is large enough to be functional, and it has exceptional style...unique but not gaudy!
customer_reviews.author: T Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect little evening bag. Small but really cute! Love the chain shoulder strap!
customer_reviews.author: Loraine Kurzeja

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged and not fixable. I’m returning for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Color was great, cute little bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this small bag to go with a dress for a cruise. Color was great, cute little bag, handle broke on first use though ;-(
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen C Carda

customer_reviews.title: Gma loves this purse
customer_reviews.text: For the price this purse is a bargain. Very cute, right size and is made well.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Swigart

customer_reviews.title: Elegance
customer_reviews.text: I LUV THS LITTLE PURSE. The color in the purse are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: First LADY

customer_reviews.title: I received exactly what I expected and needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have received the item and like it very much. Thank you! It is quite lovely.
customer_reviews.author: patricia pedigo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great for the price. Super fast shipping. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice vintage purse, smaller than i thought but extremely cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Bag
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made, lots of space. Price was excellent for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy H.

customer_reviews.title: I like this purse so far but it was very frustrating ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this purse so far but it was very frustrating since I had to replace it for the same one since the first purse I got was broken. I still believe that I should be credited for the trouble I had with the purse I've received first.
customer_reviews.author: love to shop

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my brother's wedding and it didn't last through it...Piece of trash...
customer_reviews.author: denise gaynor

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Received this bag with one side of the handle broken off. The pieces were in the clear plastic the bag it was wrapped in so my husband was able to do some repairs. I hate the hassle of returning products so I will live with it. The bag itself is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.text: worst ! Don't buy it , its made of the cheapest material -.-
customer_reviews.author: Lightning Inc
